title: Rest In Peace
description: Still stalked by an unseen force and plagued by unspeakable visions, Lucy feels she cannot carry on for much longerâ€”especially now that Byron, the one person who understood what she was going through, is dead. No one else believes her. She is still alone. And still in grave danger.In the first two books in The Unseen series, horror maven Richie Tankersley Cusick will take you on a journey into a nightmare so frightening, you will have to sleep with a light on.
author: Richie Tankersley Cusick
